channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
channel.description:
My last Interrogator class was supposed to be non-confirmable, but people said it was confirmable anyway. So I'm giving it another shot.
> # [color = "steblue"] The Interrogator [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Social [/color]** > >**Interrogate (Day)** - Send the message, [color = "purple"]**"What is your class?"**[/color] as a whisper to someone. Not usable again until that player claims to you in whisper, or they die _(this is to prevent spamming, and motivate BD to claim)_. You cannot target the same person twice. The Interrogator cannot whisper "What is your class?" outside of this ability _(to prevent spamming, so people can't just spam this question to every person in-game and claim they are an Interrogator who's bluffing on 14 of the 15 whispers)_. > >"Claiming to you in whisper" refers to the first (correctly-spelled) class mentioned in anything they whisper you after you've Interrogated them. > >**Truth Serum (Night)** - Learn the exact class of someone you've interrogated who refused to claim to you. (1 use - recharged if you find scum with this ability)
> # [color = "purple"] The Torturer [/color] > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Social [/color]** > >**Firekitten (Passive)** - Read all whispers. > >**Coerced Confession (Day)** - Trollbox a whisper from one player to another. (Infinite uses but only 3 times per day max)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Other classes CAN say it in a whisper, but nothing will come of it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
But it sorta does tho since only the interrogator can say that in whisper

(unless other classes can say it in whisper)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
That doesn’t confirm you. Literally all Interrogating a confirmed Prince is is whispering him, “What is your class?” and letting you waste Truth Serum on him if he doesn’t claim to you in whisper.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Why would you Interrogate a confirmed Prince? I don’t understand what that is supposed to accomplish.

So then you would confirm yourself

Read full topic

Perfect!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Well you are right about one thing. This is not confirmable

Yay!

NuclearBurrito:

It feels a little weak though. How about giving truth serum more uses?

Okay, I will let him recharge his ability if he finds scum with it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)

Okay, I will let him recharge his ability if he finds scum with it.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Well you are right about one thing. This is not confirmable assuming you have some means of getting someone’s class (not hard to do as scum)

It feels a little weak though. How about giving truth serum more uses?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Why would you Interrogate a confirmed Prince? I don’t understand what that is supposed to accomplish.

Sure, you can use any mispelling of “What is your class?” but nobody will have any reason to claim to that.

People will be motivated to claim to the correct spelling after you’ve claimed Interrogator because if they are BD, they want you to be able to Interrogate the next person, and if they are evil, they don’t want to be truth-serumed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Yeah but what I mean is you can use interrogate on a confirmed person like prince and then after prince confirms you can ask everyone alive their class, using any misspelling of “what is your class?” to get all the claims

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Okay, I will update it. I just felt trollboxing a whisper was super powerful. And the converted version can still perfectly fake the original.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
No. Unseen are meant to be more powerful.

I have to say this

Every cult class is more powerful than that once class.

Infinite uses. Multiple times a day.
Let it read whispers.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Is this better?

Coerced Confession (Day) - Trollbox a whisper from one player to another. (3 uses and you can use them all in one day or spread them out over multiple days)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)

item.description:

But give the unseen infinite whisper trollboxes too UP
Aka multiple times a day

item.description:
Anybody can whisper “What is your class?” except for an actual Interrogator, who must use the ability to do it.

Then how do people fake claim it.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
But there is no threat of Truth Serum to any evil who refuses to claim to “wut is ur claim”, and no motivation for BD to claim to it either since they know it’s not a real Interrogate.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Interrogate (Day) - Send the message, “What is your class?” as a whisper to someone. Not usable again until that player claims to you in whisper, or they die. You cannot target the same person twice. You cannot whisper “What is your class?” outside of this ability.

I mean this is kinda weak as you can just say the same thing but like this

“wut is ur class”

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Interrogator (Rework)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
My last Interrogator class was supposed to be non-confirmable, but people said it was confirmable anyway. So I’m giving it another shot.

The Interrogator

Blue Dragon Social

Interrogate (Day) - Send the message, "What is your class?" as a whisper to someone. Not usable again until that player claims to you in whisper, or they die (this is to prevent spamming, and motivate BD to claim). You cannot target the same person twice. The Interrogator cannot whisper “What is your class?” outside of this ability (to prevent spamming, so people can’t just spam this question to every person in-game and claim they are an Interrogator who’s bluffing on 14 of the 15 whispers).

“Claiming to you in whisper” refers to the first (correctly-spelled) class mentioned in anything they whisper you after you’ve Interrogated them.

Truth Serum (Night) - Learn the exact class of someone you’ve interrogated who refused to claim to you. (1 use - recharged if you find scum with this ability)

The Torturer

Unseen Social

Firekitten (Passive) - Read all whispers.

Coerced Confession (Day) - Trollbox a whisper from one player to another. (Infinite uses but only 3 times per day max)

Read full topic
